articles.author: Marina Magomedova
articles.title: Valve: BLAST Paris Major 2023 to be the final tournament of CS:GO majors series - Telecom Asia
articles.description: Valve announced on social networks to hold the last CS:GO major.
articles.content:
Valve announced on social networks to hold the last CS:GO major.
The decision was made because of the game's transition to the Source 2 engine, which was announced on March 22. It is already known t… [+765 chars]
